inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of migraine, chronic or episodic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Consent to participate in the CHUM Migraine Clinic IMPACT project
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: First headache diagnosis is not migraine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active psychiatric condition (needing hospitalisation or psychosis)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with mental retardation impairing assessment or follow-up
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active medical condition which may lead to frequent hospitalisations
exclusion.label: unknown
